DOC.brief_summary: A non-randomized , open-label study investigate effect imatinib mesylate pharmacokinetics acetaminophen/paracetamol patient newly diagnose , previously untreated chronic myeloid leukemia chronic phase ( CML-CP )
DOC.brief_title: Effect Imatinib Mesylate Pharmacokinetics Acetaminophen/Paracetamol Patients With Newly Diagnosed , Previously Untreated Chronic Myeloid Leukemia Chronic Phase ( CML-CP )
